thread.title: Le Diner en Blanc will make its Baltimore debut this summer - Baltimore Sun
thread.title_full: Le Diner en Blanc will make its Baltimore debut this summer - Baltimore Sun

author: Sarah Meehan
title: Le Diner en Blanc will make its Baltimore debut this summer - Baltimore Sun
text:
Le Diner en Blanc will make its Baltimore debut this summer Diner en Blanc Drew Angerer / Getty Images 
Thousands of people attended the Diner en Blanc pop-up dinner in New York City last year. 
Thousands of people attended the Diner en Blanc pop-up dinner in New York City last year. (Drew Angerer / Getty Images) 
The events will be hosted March 30, June 13 and Sept. 19 at some of the city's top restaurants, which are revealed to guests the morning of each event. ... ... (Sarah Meehan) 
Registration takes place in three phases. In the first phase, Diner en Blanc members — those who have attended previous Diner en Blanc events — and guests invited by the hosts are able to purchase tickets. Friends who are "sponsored" by those in phase one can register during phase two. And people on the wait list can sign up during phase three on a first come, first served basis. 
Courtney Bryant, Hanna Cohen and Candice Denise Owens are hosting the inaugural Baltimore dinner. 
The tradition began in Paris 30 years ago and attracts more than 10,000 people annually in its founding city. The first American Diner en Blanc was hosted in New York in 2011. Today, the dinner is held in more than 70 cities and 35 countries. Caption 10 movies that could make waves at the 2018 Oscars
